column2: "Na Siria na Israel tsenaa hɔ mfe ebiasa a ɔko bi nnyi hɔn ntamu."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no
column3: Judahen Jehosafat sianee baa Israelhen do."

column2: "Na Israelhen no see no nkowaa dɛ
column3: Ana hom nyim dɛ Ramot-gilead yɛ hɛndze
column4: na yɛayɛ komm na yɛnngye mmfi Siriahen no nsamu yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Ana enye me bɔkɔ Ramot-gilead akɔko a? Na Jehosafat see Israelhen no dɛ
column4: Metse dɛ woara
column5: me man tse dɛ wo man
column6: mo mpɔnkɔ tse dɛ wo mpɔnkɔ."

column2: "Na Jehosafat see Israelhen no dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo
column4: bisa EWURADZE n'asɛm ndɛ."

column2: "Nna Israelhen no boaboaa nkɔnhyɛfo no ano
column3: mbarimba bɛyɛ ahaanan
column4: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: Ana monkɔ Ramot-gilead nkɔko
column7: Fow kɔ; na EWURADZE dze bɛhyɛ ɔhen nsa."

column2: "Na Jehosafat see dɛ
column3: Ana EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛnyi bi so nnyi ha
column4: ma yeebebisa no hɔ adze?"

column2: "Na Israelhen no see Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Ɔbarimba baako bi da ho wɔ ha a nkyɛ yɛnam no do bebisa EWURADZE hɔ adze
column4: Imla ne ba Mikaia a: na mikyir no; osiandɛ ɔnnhyɛ mo ho nkɔm pa
column5: na bɔn nko. Na Jehosafat see dɛ

column2: "Nna Israelhen no frɛɛ ɔsafohen bi
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Kɛfa Imla ne ba Mikaia bra ntsɛmara."

column2: "Afei Israelhen na Juda hen Jehosafat tsetse hɔn nhengua do nkorkor
column3: hyehyɛ hɔn ahentar
column4: wɔ Samaria kuropon ahɛnee gua do; na nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara rehyɛ nkɔm wɔ hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na Kenaana ne ba Zedekia yɛɛ dadze mmbɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column5: Iyinom na edze bosun Siriafo no ara ma wɔahyew."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara hyɛɛ nkɔm dɛm
column3: dɛ
column4: Fow kɔ Ramot-gilead na kɛyɛ yie: na EWURADZE dze bɛhyɛ ɔhen nsa."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no a ɔkɔr dɛ ɔrekɛfrɛ Mikaia no kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Afei hwɛ
column4: nkɔnhyɛfo no dze ano kor ka nsɛm pa kyerɛ ɔhen: Meserɛ wo
column5: ma w'asɛm nyɛ dɛ hɔn mu baako n'asɛm

column2: "Na Mikaia see dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column4: dza EWURADZE bɛse me no
column5: ɔno na mebɛka."

column2: "Na aber a ɔbaa ɔhen no nkyɛn no
column3: ɔhen no see no dɛ
column4: Mikaia
column5: ana yɛnkɔ Ramot-gilead nkɔko
column7: Fow kɔ na kɛyɛ yie; na EWURADZE dze bɛhyɛ ɔhen nsa."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Mpɛn ahen ara na menka ntam ngu wo do ma ka dza ɔyɛ nokwar nko wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu kyerɛ me?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Muhun Israel nyinara dɛ wɔapetse mbepɔw do
column4: dɛ nguan a wonnyi oguanhwɛfo: na EWURADZE see dɛ
column5: Iyinom wonnyi wura; ma wɔnsan
column6: nyimpa biara nkɔ ne fie asomdwee mu."

column2: "Na Israelhen no see Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Ana mannka annkyerɛ wo dɛ
column4: Ɔnnkɛhyɛ mo ho nkɔm pa
column5: dɛ bɔn nko?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛm ntsi tsie EWURADZE n'asɛm: Muhun EWURADZE dɛ ɔtse n'ahengua do
column4: na ɔsor dɔm nyinara gyinagyina no ho wɔ n'enyimfa na n'abankum."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column3: Woana na ɔbɛdaadaa Ahab
column4: ma ɔaafow akɔ akɔtɔr wɔ Ramot-gilead? Na obi see dɛm; na obi so see dɛm."

column2: "Na sunsum bi fiir edzi begyinaa EWURADZE enyim na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mara mebɛdaadaa no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Edze ebɛnadze? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mibefir edzi
column5: na makɛyɛ sunsum torfo wɔ no nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara anomu. Na ɔsee dɛ
column7: na ibedzi nyim so: fir edzi kɔ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: hwɛ
column4: EWURADZE dze sunsum torfo ahyɛ wo nkɔnhyɛfo yi nyinara anomu; na EWURADZE akasa wo ho bɔn."

column2: "Nna Kenaana ne ba Zedekia twee pinii
column3: na ɔbɔɔ Mikaia sotɔr see dɛ
column4: Ebɛn kwan do na EWURADZE no sunsum fii me nkyɛn bɛkaa iyi kyerɛɛ wo?"

column2: "Na Mikaia see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ da no a ebɔkɔ mpiakyir pia mu dɛ irukosuma woho no na ibohu."

column2: "Na Israelhen no see dɛ
column3: Fa Mikaia
column4: na fa no san kɔ kɛma kurow no mu ambrado Amon
column5: na ɔhen ne ba Joas;"

column2: "na se dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ ɔhen se nye yi
column4: Hom mfa akowaa yi nto efiadze
column5: na hom mfa ahohiahia edziban na ahohiahia nsu mbɔ no akɔhoma
column6: ma onkodu dɛ mebɛba no asomdwee mu."

column2: "Na Mikaia see dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔwoara esan ba no asomdwee mu ara dze a
column4: nna nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔnam mo do akasa. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Aman

column2: "Nna Israelhen na Judahen Jehosafat sii mu kɔr Ramot-gilead."
"Na Israelhen no see Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Mebɛsakyer moho na makɔ ɔko no mu; na ɔwo dze hyɛ wo ntar. Na Israelhen no sakyeer noho na ɔkɔr ɔko no mu."

column2: "Afei Siriahen no ahyɛ ne tseaseanam do asafohemfo eduasa ebien no dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnye kakraba anaa kɛse nnko
column4: gyedɛ Israelhen no nkotsee."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a ntseaseanam do asafohemfo no hun Jehosafat no
column3: nna wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ampa
column5: Israelhen no nye no; na wɔdaan hɔnho dɛ wɔnye no rokɔko: na Jehosafat kekaa mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ntseaseanam do asafohemfo no hun dɛ nnyɛ Israelhen nye no no
column4: nna wogyaa no tsiw saan hɔn ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔbarimba bi twee n'egyen mu ntɔgon mu ara
column3: na ɔdze bɔɔ Israelhen no wɔ mbɔtoa mu na akatabo no ntamu: dɛm ntsi ɔsee ne tseaseanamkanyi no dɛ
column4: Dan wo nsa
column5: na fa me fi dɔm yi mu; na mepira dzendzen."

column2: "Na ɔko no mu yɛɛ dzen da no: na wosuoo ɔhen no mu gyinaa ne tseaseanam mu wɔ Siriafo enyim
column3: na ɔtɔɔr ewimbir: na bɔgya fi epirakur no mu pemee kɔr tseaseanam no ase."

column2: "Na nkekamu bi faa dɔm no mu witɔree ber no
column3: dɛ
column4: Nyimpa biara nkɔ no kurow mu
column5: na nyimpa biara nkɔ ne man mu."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no wui
column3: na wɔdze no baa Samaria; na wosiee ɔhen no wɔ Samaria."

column2: "Na wɔkɔhohoor tseaseanam no mu wɔ Samaria nsutaae ho; na nkraman tafeer no bɔgyaa; (afei mbaa ehuhufo hohor hɔnho wɔ hɔ;) dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔkae no tse no."
"Afei Ahab no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: na asombɛn dan a osii
column5: na nkurow a ɔkyekyeree nyinara
column6: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Ahab kɔr ne nsamankyir; na ne babanyin Ahazia dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
"Na Israelhen Ahab n'afe a otsia anan no mu na Asa ne ba Jehosafat hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Juda do."
"Jehosafat dzii mfe eduasa enum no nna ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii hen; na odzii hen mfe eduonu enum wɔ Jerusalɛm. Na ne na ne dzin dze Azuba
column3: Silhi ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔnantseew n'egya Asa kwan no nyinara do; ɔanndan emmfi ho
column3: dɛ ɔyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do: naaso oennyi mbea sorɔnsorɔm no emmfi hɔ; ɔman no daa ho bɔɔ afɔr na wɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm no."

column2: "Na nsiesie baa Jehosafat nye Israelhen no ntamu."
"Afei Jehosafat no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na ne mbanyinndam a ɔkyerɛe
column4: na mbrɛ osii dzii ako no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na sodomfo nkaa a wɔkae wɔ n'egya Asa nda no mu no
column3: otuu hɔn fii asaase no do."

column2: "Nna ɔhen bi nnyi Edom: na ahyɛnanmu bi na odzi hen."
"Jehosafat yɛɛ Tarsis ahɛn dɛ wɔnkɔ Ofir nkɛfa sika: na wɔannkɔ
column3: osiandɛ ahɛn no bobɔe wɔ Ezion-geber."

column2: "Nna Ahab ne ba Ahazia see Jehosafat dɛ
column3: Ma mo nkowaa nka wo nkowaa ho nkɔ ahɛn no mu. Na Jehosafat ammpen."

column2: "Na Jehosafat kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no kaa n'egyanom ho wɔ n'egya David kurow mu: na ne babanyin Jehoram dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."

column2: "Judahen Jehosafat n'afe a otsia duesuon no mu na Ahab ne ba Ahazia hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel
column3: na odzii hen mfe ebien wɔ Israel do."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na ɔnantseew n'egya no kwan no do
column4: na ne na no kwan do
column5: na Nebat ne ba Jeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no

column2: "Na ɔsoom Baal
column3: na ɔsɔɔr no
column4: na oyii EWURADZE
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no ebufuw
column6: dɛ mbrɛ dza n'egya yɛe no nyinara tse."
